Parameter.name: BATTERY_TYPE
Parameter.Description: Battery Type (ANALOG|BATTERY_EMULATOR|DIGITAL|TEST2|INVALID|REMOVED) or leave empty to use the one from device catalog

Parameter.name: CHARGER_TYPE
Parameter.Description: Charger Type : None | ALL | DCP (current=1.5A) | SDP (Current=0.5A) | CDP(Current=1.5A)| AC_CHGR (Current=2.5A)

UseCase.Description: Monitor battery Charge when setting Battery temperature.

Parameter.name: BATT_TEMP_UNDER
Parameter.Description: Temperature (in degree Celsius) to put battery under normal temperature state

Parameter.name: BATT_TEMP_OVER
Parameter.Description: Temperature (in degree Celsius) to put battery over normal temperature state

UseCase.Description: Long keypress on power button while platform is off
Platform shall charge the battery to CRITICAL level before entering NORMAL mode. Platform shall be able to boot in CHARGING ONLY mode when battery DEAD threshold is reached and charger connected.

Parameter.name: CHARGER_TYPE
Parameter.Description: Charger to use for the test

Parameter.name: SCU_CHARGING_HI_VOLTAGE
Parameter.Description: Voltage to use for the test at the high bound of the SCU charging field

Parameter.name: COS_CHARGING_HI_VOLTAGE
Parameter.Description: Voltage to use for the test at the high bound of the COS field

Parameter.name: MOS_CHARGING_LO_VOLTAGE
Parameter.Description: Voltage to use for the test at the low bound of the MOS field

Parameter.name: EXT_PS
Parameter.Description: active or not the external power supply, can be TRUE or FALSE
